title: PHPoctdec()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPoctdec()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example Convert octal to decimal: "; echo octdec("12") . "
"; echo octdec("3063") . "
"; echo octdec("106"); ?> Definition and Usage The octdec() function converts an octal number to a decimal number. Tip: To convert decimal to octal, look at the decoct() function. Syntax octdec( octal_string ); Parameter Values Parameter Description octal_string Required. Specifies the octal string to convert Technical Details Return Value: The decimal value of octal_string Return Type: Float / Integer PHP Version: 4+ ★ +1

content_sections.title: Example
content_sections.code:
"; echo octdec("12") . "
"; echo octdec("3063") . "
"; echo octdec("106"); ?>

summary: This tutorial covers PHPoctdec()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPoctdec()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples.
